ShroomBrew.NAME: Shroom Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Exhaust a card. NL The effect of this potion depends on the type of the card you Exhausted.
Attack : Fear Potion ; NL Skill : Weak Potion ; NL Power : Poison Potion ; NL Status : Fire Potion ; NL Curse : Smoke Bomb .
